mil5.4.1:1.2_0: ‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ iddhimantānaṁ yadidaṁ mahāmoggallāno’ti.
mil5.4.1:1.3_0: Puna ca kira so laguḷehi paripothito bhinnasīso sañcuṇṇitaṭṭhimaṁsadhamanichinnaparigatto parinibbuto.
mil5.4.1:1.4_3: tena hi laguḷehi pothito parinibbutoti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.4.1:1.5_0: Yadi laguḷehi paripothito parinibbuto, tena hi iddhiyā koṭiṁ gatoti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.4.1:1.6_0: Kiṁ na samattho iddhiyā attano upaghātaṁ apanayituṁ,
mil5.4.1:1.7_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.4.1:2.2_0: ‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ iddhimantānaṁ yadidaṁ mahāmoggallāno’ti.
mil5.4.1:2.3_0: Āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno laguḷahato parinibbuto, tañca pana kammādhiggahitenā”ti.
mil5.4.1:3.2_0: Yathā nāma, bhante, keci phalakāmā kapitthena kapitthaṁ pothenti, ambena ambaṁ pothenti;
mil5.4.1:3.3_0: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, acintiyena acintiyaṁ pothayitvā apanetabban”ti?
mil5.4.1:3.5_2: samajaccānampi tesaṁ eko sabbe abhibhavitvā āṇaṁ pavatteti;
mil5.4.1:3.6_2: kammavipākaṁ yeva sabbe abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti,
mil5.4.1:3.6_3: kammādhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā okāsaṁ na labhanti.
mil5.4.1:4.1_2: na tassa mātā vā pitā vā bhaginī vā bhātaro vā sakhī vā sahāyakā vā tāyanti,
mil5.4.1:4.1_3: atha kho rājāyeva tattha abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti.
mil5.4.1:4.4_3: kammādhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā okāsaṁ na labhanti.
mil5.4.1:5.1_1: mahiyā davaḍāhe samuṭṭhite ghaṭasahassampi udakaṁ na sakkoti nibbāpetuṁ,
mil5.4.1:5.1_2: atha kho aggiyeva tattha abhibhaviya āṇaṁ pavatteti.
mil5.4.1:5.4_1: tesaṁ acintiyānaṁ kammavipākaṁ yeva adhimattaṁ balavataraṁ,
mil5.4.1:5.4_3: kammādhiggahitassa avasesā kiriyā okāsaṁ na labhanti, tasmā, mahārāja,
mil5.4.1:5.4_4: āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa kammādhiggahitassa laguḷehi pothiyamānassa iddhiyā samannāhāro nāhosī”ti.
